AdditionalChanges: Additional changes by contributors on Github
AnotherInstanceIsAlreadyRunning: Another instance of the app is already running.
ApplyColorToSelectionToolTip: Apply color to all buildings in current selection
ApplyPredefinedColorToSelectionToolTip: Apply predefined color (if found) to all buildings in current selection
BuildingLayoutDesigner: A building layout designer for Ubisofts Anno-series
ClipboardContainsLayoutAsJson: Clipboard contains current layout as JSON.
ColorsInLayoutToolTip: Double click color to select it
ContinueCheckingForUpdates:
Do you want to continue checking for a new version on startup?

This option can be changed via Tools -> Preferences -> Update Settings.
CopyLayoutToClipboard: Copy layout to clipboard as JSON
EnableAutomaticUpdateCheck: Enable automatic update check on startup
ErrorUpgradingSettings: The settings file has become corrupted. We must reset your settings.
ExportImageError: Something went wrong while exporting the image.
ExternalLinkConfirmationMessage: This will open a new tab in your default web browser. Continue?
FileVersionMismatchMessage:
Try loading anyway?
This is very likely to fail or result in strange things happening.
FileVersionUnsupportedMessage:
Try loading anyway?
This is very likely to fail or result in strange things happening.
IOErrorMessage: Something went wrong while saving/loading file.
Label: Label
LayoutLoadingError: Something went wrong while loading the layout.
LayoutSavingError: Something went wrong while saving the layout.
LoadingIconNamesFailed: Loading of the icon names failed.
LoadingPresetsFailed: Loading of the building presets failed.
LoadLayoutMessage: Please paste the JSON string below.
ManyThanks: Many thanks to all the users who contributed to this project!
PavedStreetToolTip:
Checking this option will change the Influence Range for buildings, 
representing the increased range they receive when using paved streets.
Use the 'Place Building' button to place an object.
RegisterFileExtensionSuccessful: Registration of file extension was successful.
ResetAllConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all hotkeys to their defaults?
SearchPlaceholder: Type the name of a building here
SelectAllSameIdentifier: Select all buildings of same type
ShowMultipleInstanceWarning: Show warning if multiple instances are open
StatusBarControls: Mouse controls: left - place, select, move // right - stop placement, remove // both - move all // double click - copy // wheel - zoom // wheel-click - rotate.
UnregisterFileExtensionSuccessful: Deregistration of file extension was successful.
UnsavedChangedBeforeCrash: Program crashed but there are unsaved changes
UpdateAvailablePresetMessage:
An updated version of the preset file is available.
Do you want to download it and restart the application?
UpdateErrorPresetMessage: There was an error installing the update.
UpdateNoConnectionMessage: Could not establish a connection to the internet.
UpdatePreferencesMoreInfoInLog: More information is found in the log.
UpdatePreferencesNewAppUpdateAvailable: A new update is available! Please check the website for release notes.
UpdatePreferencesNewPresetsUpdateAvailab: A new update for the Presets is available!
UpdatePreferencesNoUpdates: This version is up to date.
UpdateRequiresAdminRightsMessage: To download the update the application needs write access. Please provide credentials.
VersionCheckErrorMessage:
Error checking version.
More information can be found in the log.
VisitTheFandom: Be sure to visit the Fandom pages for Anno!
WarningMultipleInstancesAreRunning: There is an update, but the app is open multiple times. Close all instances and start just 1 instance to allow the update to work.
